entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Akulivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:12 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -39.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Akulivik Airport 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -39.1°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Humidity: 65 %

Dewpoint: -43.2°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 51 this morning and minus 45 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 33.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this evening. Temperature steady near minus 33. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
